original: 馮翊東縣人，李豐之女，賈充之妻。頗具才名，為當世才女。因其父李豐密謀誅殺司馬師事敗，遭到牽連，被判處流徙。後雖蒙晉武帝司馬炎赦免，但不被賈充所接納。
text: Feng Yidong County, daughter of Li Feng, wife of Jia Chong. Quite a talented woman. Because his father Li Feng conspired to kill Sima, he was implicated and sentenced to exile. Although he was pardoned by Emperor Wudi Sima Yan of Jin Dynasty, he was not accepted by Jia Chong.
